'''Flammabomb Wood "Dancer" Street Lamp''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Flammabomb Wood "Dancer" Street Lamp is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Tequemecan Valley}}.
<gallery>
Item Flammabomb Wood "Dancer" Street Lamp Location.png|Map location
Item Flammabomb Wood "Dancer" Street Lamp Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>
